Articles.Content: I Recently installed the kopernicus mod, I made a few planets, and got tired of them, so I deleted the mod. But now, Every time I visit laythe, I find that some of the surface is dark blue now.. It wasn't like that before.. Can anyone please tell me what this is, and what I should do, to fix it?

They're called oceans.

On a more serious note, pics can help us help you a lot more.

[https://plus.google.com/u/0/115474247218741785259/posts](https://plus.google.com/u/0/115474247218741785259/posts)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-17T03:01:58Z" title="07/17/2015 03:01  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 17, 2015</time> by HalTheFox**
That looks like an ocean to me....
I posted how it should look.

> 
> I posted how it should look.

That's not going to help in the least.

If you want us to help figure out what's wrong, then you're going to have to show us what it \*does\* look like.

I did... Just click the link..

- - - Updated - - -

Herbaflerbaderbygibadolafolaoloaallahslakubaewjigihiggbosonsasdaflabaderbawelayatheasukoisandabol.....Hebederbilerbgapflap.
Never mind, Its probably something I just did..

> 
> I did... Just click the link..
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Herbaflerbaderbygibadolafolaoloaallahslakubaewjigihiggbosonsasdaflabaderbawelayatheasukoisandabol.....Hebederbilerbgapflap.

What?

All I can make out of that is "Higgs Boson"
You should probably try reinstalling KSP.

Ok, I'll do that. That's probably the best thing to do. Thank you.

- - - Updated - - -

Thanks It works again! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
